Text: Can anyone confirm whether this works on NTSC wii? Is this in english?

PS.
The game works for me with using usb loader gx. It worked on 3.4u, 4.2u, and 4.3u softmodded wiis. Also worked on Neogamma R8 using burned disc. Use Auto Force, yes, all, and yes for it to work (I think that was the order).
